Single parents
If you are pregnant and on 
your own, it is important that 
there are people who can 
support you. Sorting out 
problems, whether personal 
or	medical,	is	often	difficult	
when you are by yourself, and 
it’s	better	to	find	someone	to	
talk to rather than to let things 
get	you	down.	You	may	find	
it encouraging to meet other 
mothers who have also gone 
through pregnancy on their 
own.
Don’t feel that, just because you 
don’t have a partner, you have 
to go to antenatal visi
